title: Won't let me leave lobby, join others lobbies, or invite people to my lobby.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Left my League client on overnight, and then today when I planned on playing I couldn't leave the lobby I had created last night. I texted my friend and asked him to invite me to see if that would work. I was given an error message when I tried joining. Tried inviting him he was given the same error message I got when I tried joining his lobby. Tried changing the lobby type, was given an error message. I can still play the game but I can't play with friends.

replies.body:
I'm having this same issue. In a lobby by myself had invited 2 others. now even when relogging i'm still in this same lobby, still having the same roles selected and invites sent previously. also my invites wont disappear from my friend's client that i sent to him. I also get red error messages when trying to join other's lobbys, or even when attempting to switch to a different type of lobby (e.g. blind pick or ranked) 

I ran the hextech repair tool and did a clean uninstall and reinstall of my game and i'm still having this issue..

Edit: it also seems for me this may have been caused by leaving client on overnight?

Apologies for the late response here; that does look more than mildly irritating! :( 

If you're still getting the issue, when you log out of your client and then back in, or if you try to repair your client with the client repair option in your settings menu, does that eliminate the error messages you're getting and let you queue up with friends as normal?

having the same problem, finished a game with a friend, was removed from the party as i was logging off, got back on afterwards and am in a lobby with the friend (who is offline) and cant start games because its waiting on them to select roles (they already have but arent online so no clue) everything is greyed out.

cant leave the party either, tried relogging and just throws me into the lobby when i log back in.

https://imgur.com/cAfparV
